value.name: Family of mentally ill man slain by police pushes oversight agency for justice
value.description: In the two years since her son Kawaski Trawick was shot and killed by police inside his apartment in the Bronx, Ellen Trawick says her family has been let down again and again. "At this point, my family and I are demanding that Herbert Davis and Brendan Thompson be fired from the New York Police Department,

value.name: Reform starts with humanity: That’s the quintessential, often missing ingredient in policing
value.description: America’s long-overdue process of reforming law enforcement picked up steam in the year since the nation reacted in outrage to video depicting the slow murder of George Floyd by a Minneapolis policeman.

value.name: Family of mentally ill man slain by police pushes oversight agency for justice
value.description: NEW YORK — In the two years since her son Kawaski Trawick was shot and killed by police inside his apartment in the Bronx, Ellen Trawick says her family has been let down again and again.
